name: TANKS: Sci-Fi Battle
description:
TANKS: SCI-FI BATTLE

Each tank has its own unique characteristics, using a smart artificial intelligence behavior to move, attack and defend.

FEATURES:
- 8 different tanks and turrets
- 34 missions (more to come)
- Android TV support

SMART AI:
- offensive movement
- defensive movement
- single and double ricochet attack
- counter-attack bullets
- flock attack
- flee bullets
